welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Vito al Tagliamento
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Vito al Tagliamento, a charming city in northern Italy known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Buon viaggio!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aviano Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronchi Dei Legionari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.
